deleteModal.status.failure: An error occurred when trying to delete this {type}.
deleteModal.title: Confirm that you want to delete the {name} {type}?
signUp.modal.title: Sign up on OpenStreetMap
signup.modal.text1: Tasking Manager works with and to OpenStreetMap (OSM), the collaborative map of all the world.
signup.modal.text2: All the data mapped in Tasking Manager projects are available on OSM. So you need an OpenStreetMap account in order to collaborate in one of our projects.
signup.modal.question: So that we can keep in touch, could you please tell us your email address?
signup.modal.redirect: You will be redirect to the OpenStreetMap website after clicking on the button below.
emailUpdate.modal.title: Update your email
emailUpdate.modal.text1: When you contribute to the Tasking Manager, it is important that notifications about the tasks and projects you contributed to are reaching you.
emailUpdate.modal.text2: Before you begin mapping, please add your email address.
emailUpdate.modal.privacy_policy: Check out our Privacy Policy and how we protect the users personal data.
home.mainSection.title: Map a task for people in need
home.mainSection.lead: Join a global community that is helping to put the world's most vulnerable people and places on the map towards humanitarian aid and sustainable development.
home.callToAction.title: We can't do it without you
home.callToAction.firstLeadLine: If you have never mapped before and would like to help, don't worry it's easy. Visit our {link} page to get started mapping in less than 30 minutes.
home.callToAction.secondLeadLine: Seasoned mapper? Pick up one of our many projects and start contributing.
home.featuredProjects.title: Featured Projects
home.mappingFlow.title: Each year, disasters around the world kill nearly {number} and affect or displace 200 million people. We're on a mission to change that. Here's how.
home.mappingFlow.headLine: Through the Tasking Manager this mapping  projects are divided into smaller tasks allowing them to be completed by many different people working in the same area in a more streamlined and quick way.
home.mappingFlow.cards.mapping.title: Mapping
home.mappingFlow.cards.validation.title: Validation
home.mappingFlow.cards.usingData.title: Using the data
home.mappingFlow.cards.mapping.descripti: Volunteers trace satellite imagery into OpenStreetMap using Tasking Manager.
home.mappingFlow.cards.validation.descri: Afterwards, seasoned volunteers double check the data entered assuring its quality.
home.mappingFlow.cards.usingData.descrip: Humanitarian organizations use mapped data to plan risk reduction and disaster response activities.
home.whoIsMapping.title: Who's mapping
home.whoIsMapping.headline: Global trusted organizations use Tasking Manager to reach those in need through maps.
home.whoIsMapping.contact.title: Does your organization want to work with us?
home.whoIsMapping.contact.headline: Contact us to find out how we can work together.
home.testimonials.title: You can make a difference
home.testimonials.michaelYani.citation: Mapping has made me learn how to use a smart phone to collect data and direct people to places they didn't know around the district. I have also started teaching other people how to use smart phones to locate places around the district.
home.testimonials.michaelYani.bio: a refugee from Sudan who currently resides in Rhino Refugee Settlement
foooter.definition: Tasking Manager is a platform where people can help humanitarian causes by mapping in OpenStreetMap.
footer.credits: Made by HOTOSM Community. Get in touch.
notifications.mainSection.title: Notifications
management.projects.create.title: Create project
It was not possible to save your project due to an error: {error}
Your project will be created with {n} tasks.
management.projects.create.trim_tasks.de: Trim the task grid to the area of interest (optional).
You can keep all the current tasks, or clip them to the area of interest of your project. This can take some time to execute.
management.projects.create.trim_tasks.tr: Clip tasks to the Area of Interest
management.projects.create.split_task.de: Make tasks smaller by clicking on specific tasks or drawing an area on the map.
management.projects.create.split.tasks.n: A new project will be created with {n} tasks.
management.projects.create.split.tasks.a: The size of each task is approximately {area} km{sq}.
management.projects.create.upload_file.e: Error when importing geometry. Verify if the file you uploaded is correct.
management.projects.create.draw.descript: Draw the Area of Interest on the map.
management.projects.create.upload.descri: Import a GeoJSON, KML, OSM or zipped SHP file.
project.detail.cards.selectATask.title: 1. Select a task
project.detail.cards.mapthroughosm.title: 2. Map through OpenStreetMap
project.detail.cards.selectATask.descrip: Projects are subdivided into a set of tasks managable in size and adapted to your skill level.
project.detail.cards.mapthroughosm.descr: If you are new to mapping, we recommend checking the Learn page before you start mapping.
project.detail.cards.submityourwork.desc: Submitting your work is cruicial. If you don't do it, it will not be merged into the project.
project.detail.sections.contributions.ti: The timeline will be available when at least one task is mapped.
project.mainSection.title: Generic project
project.tasks.action.instructions.select: Select one of the options below that matches your edit status
project.tasks.action.comment.title: Comment
project.tasks.action.comment.input.place: Write a comment on this task
project.tasks.action.selection.title: Edit status
project.tasks.action.options.bad_imagery: It wasn't possible to map due to bad imagery
management.messages.notAllowed: You are not allowed to manage organisations.
management.edit_members: You will be able to add more users after save for the first time.
management.fields.name: Name
management.teams.no_teams: You are not member of a team yet.
management.teams.invite_only.description: Managers need to approve members requests to join
management.organisation.teams.no_found: This organisation doesn't have teams yet.
user.name: Name
user.settings.title: Settings
user.notifications.title: Notifications
user.settings.expert_mode.description: Expert mode makes advanced and experimental features available. Most users should leave this off.
user.settings.default_editor.description: Select the default editor that you want to use when fixing tasks. By selecting this option you will be able to skip the editor selection dialog after selecting a task to map or validate.
user.settings.become_validator.descripti: If you feel sure of your skills as a mapper and you are looking for a new challenge, apply for the validator role. If your application is successful you can then start to validate other mapper's tasks.
user.notifications.mentions.description: Every time you're mentioned on a comment, you get a notification.
user.notifications.projects.description: You get a notification if any project you've contributed made progress.
user.notifications.comments.description: You get a notification every time someone comments on the project you've contributed to.
user.welcome.title: Welcome to Tasking Manager!
user.interests.title: Tell us about you and the kind of projects you're interested in.
user.interests.lead: We'll ask you to select causes of your interest because this will help us recommend the right projects for you.
user.completeness.title: Complete your profile
user.help.card.title: Need help?
user.welcome.firstProject.title: Contribute to your first project
user.welcome.firstProject.text1: Looks like you haven't mapped any task yet.
user.welcome.firstProject.text2: Fortunately, it's very easy to map one!
user.welcome.firstProject.text3: You can start mapping by selecting one of the project below, recommended for you.
user.osm.title: OSM Details
user.settings.apiKey.title: API Key
user.settings.apiKey.description: With this API Key, you can authenticate and use all the resources of the Tasking Manager API. For more details, checkout the {link}.
user.settings.email.confirmation: Please check your email account in order to confirm your email address.
notFound.page.title: Page not found
notFound.project.title: Project {id} not found
notFound.lead: Check the URL or report this error.
loginPage.title: Login or register an account
taskAction.messages.error.no_locked_task: You can not do any action on the Project #{currentProject}, because you have locked tasks on project #{lockedProject}. Unlock the tasks on Project #{currentProject}, so you will be able to map and validate other projects.
You don't have any locked tasks. Access the Project #{currentProject} to select a task to map.
EmailVerification.status.error.explanati: The verification of your email failed. Check if the URL on the browser matches with the URL sent to your email.
EmailVerification.status.verified.explan: Thanks for informing us your email address.
From now on, we will keep you updated on how you can make the difference by mapping on Tasking Manager. You can customize your notification preferences on {link}.
